name: Roland Banks
ability: After you defeat an enemy: Discover 1 clue at your location. (Limit once per round)
elder_sign: +1 for each clue at your location

name: Agnes Baker
ability: After one or more horror is placed on Agnes Baker: Deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location. (Limit once per phase)
elder_sign: +1 for each horror on agnes baker
